      • checkPile

        public boolean checkPile​(java.util.ArrayList<Card> firstList)
        This card check whether the movement of card from column to pile match with the gamerule
        Parameters:
        firstList - column of the card in(Basically is the first user input)
        Returns:
        Return true if follow gamerule else false

      • movePile

        public void movePile()
        If checkPile return true, then the card will be moved to Pile If checkPile return false, then the card will not be moved to Pile

        Parameters:
        firstList - The column the card in
        tempCard - The card user want to move
        secondList - The destination of the card
